_metadata.description: Scan history, configuration management, and audit trails

requirements.title: Scan history tracking - resource used
requirements.description: Record which AI resource was used for each issue (resource-claude-code vs resource-codes)
requirements.notes: Store in issues table as resource_id

requirements.title: Scan history tracking - creation timestamp
requirements.description: Record when each issue was created

requirements.title: Scan history tracking - campaign linkage
requirements.description: Record which campaign and session produced each issue

requirements.title: Configurable thresholds - central storage
requirements.description: Store all thresholds in postgres config table (no hard-coding)
requirements.notes: Long file lines, max scans per file, max concurrent campaigns

requirements.title: Configurable thresholds - per-scenario override
requirements.description: Support per-scenario threshold overrides for special cases
requirements.notes: E.g., allow longer files in generated code scenarios

requirements.title: Read-only agent queries
requirements.description: Agent read calls return existing data without triggering new scans by default
requirements.notes: Prevent accidental scan storms from agent loops

requirements.title: Force scan flag
requirements.description: Support explicit force flag to trigger new scan from agent API

requirements.title: Force scan queueing
requirements.description: Enqueue force-scan requests in controlled queue with global concurrency limit
requirements.notes: Prevent overwhelming AI resources with concurrent scans
